title: TYO Mag
about: TYO Mag is an online arts and literary magazine featuring artwork from Japanese artists and foreign artists working in Japan. As conceived by myself and my co-founder, TYO is meant to help connect those creating art in Tokyo and Japan to the outside art world (especially the non-Japanese speaking art world).

title: Kris Hartrum
about: My TYO co-founder, Kris Hartrum, was in need of a new site to showcase his writing. His previous site was only a Wordpress blog, and he needed something that would easily allow potential freelance clients to see some of his more serious work published elsewhere.

title: Tender Buttons Illustrated
about: A painter friend, Sadie Starnes, was looking for a new project to kill some time in between art shows. Sharing a mutual love of Gertrude Stein's Tender Buttons, I created a site for her to post illustrated passages from the book.
